Articles.Content:
hey yall im wally. just getting into this rocket flyin business you boys got goin on here. might fine stuff indeed.

i got a quick question here i might wanna run by yall real fast. maybe yall can help me out.

ya see yall got them fany Z MAP SATELLITES, and apparently you can mine some gas?

exactly how is that done? or am i just reading something thats in the works? oh and do the mapping sats actually do anything?

thanks for the info!

wally

It sounds like you're describing the Kethane mod.

You can find some more info in its thread [thread=23979]here[/thread].

Welcome to the community Eyko16

Have fun with the Kethane addon

does the zmap sat have anything to do with the kethane? or those science tool doo dads?

it is all pretty interesting, im sure ill enjoy this game!
The zmap is a stock satellite, and as such has no parts in it that require mods.
You can try this for satellite mapping here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/9396-0-20-ISA-MapSat-4-0-Dev-Build?highlight=mapping and Welcome aboard KSP!!
